label: Nov 20, 1963 · Dallas, TX
title: The Ralph Leon Yates incident
body: Ralph Leon Yates, a refrigeration mechanic, picks up a hitchhiker carrying a long paper-wrapped package. The man asks about the President's motorcade route and says he could shoot anyone from a building with a scope rifle.

label: Late Sept 1963 · Dallas, TX
title: The Sylvia Odio Incident
body: Sylvia Odio reported that three men, including one identified as 'Leon Oswald', visited her home in Dallas to seek support for the anti-Castro cause. The visit allegedly occurred while Oswald was purportedly elsewhere.
